Jaxon Smith-Njigba

Jaxon Smith-Njigba  (JSN or Emerald City Route Artist)

Position: WR Throws: Right

6-0, 197lb (183cm, 89kg)

Team: Seattle Seahawks

Born: February 14, 2002 in Nacogdoches, TX

College: Ohio St.  (College Stats)

Weighted Career AV (100-95-...): 30 (3953rd overall since 1960)

High School: Rockwall (TX)

Draft: Seattle Seahawks in the 1st round (20th overall) of the 2023 NFL Draft.

Pronunciation: \in-JIG-buh\

  • 2x Pro Bowl
  • 1x All-Pro
  • 1x SB Champ
  • 2025 AP Off. PoY
  • 2025 PFWA Off. PoY
  • 2025 SN Off. PoY

2/21 After winning Offensive Rookie of the Year and a Super Bowl in 2025, Seahawks wide receiver Jaxon Smith-Njigba is eligible for a contract extension this offseason. The Seahawks will prioritize a new deal
See More at ProFootballRumors.com

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Jaxon Smith-Njigba?

Jaxon Smith-Njigba is 24 years old.

When was Jaxon Smith-Njigba born?

Jaxon Smith-Njigba was born on February 14, 2002.

Where was Jaxon Smith-Njigba born?

Jaxon Smith-Njigba was born in Nacogdoches, TX.

How tall is Jaxon Smith-Njigba?

Jaxon Smith-Njigba is 6-0 (183 cm) tall.

How much does Jaxon Smith-Njigba weigh?

Jaxon Smith-Njigba weighs 197 lbs (89 kg).

How many games does Jaxon Smith-Njigba play?

Jaxon Smith-Njigba played 17 games last season and 51 games over his career.

How many receptions does Jaxon Smith-Njigba have?

Jaxon Smith-Njigba had 119 receptions last season and 282 receptions over his career.

How many receiving yards does Jaxon Smith-Njigba have?

Jaxon Smith-Njigba had 1,793 receiving yards last season and 3,551 receiving yards over his career.

How many Super Bowls has Jaxon Smith-Njigba won?

Jaxon Smith-Njigba has won 1 Super Bowl.

What are Jaxon Smith-Njigba's nicknames?

JSN, Emerald City Route Artist are nicknames for Jaxon Smith-Njigba.
